resources.string: Welcome to the world of solving misconception

Welcome to Real Ball!
 The ball is controlled by tilting the phone.
 
 To begin a level, click level select from the main menu, then choose from the levels you have unlocked. To unlock a new level, you must beat the level before it.
 
 You can also start a free style level in which there is no goal. Press back to end the level.
 
 After completing a level you can see the graph of your speed and velocity over time. Also, clicking check graph in the main menu will allow you to see your last graph.
 
 Levels 4,5, and 6 are wind levels in which your ball is accelerated by the wind. In order to get wind speed data, go to options and enter your zip code. Otherwise, a default value will be used.
 
 You may also select options from the main menu to turn on or off the music.
 
 Press the quit button to exit the game.
